title: WTB: Griffith bat EPDG and Oakes EPDG
author: Redleg25

posts.post_title: WTB: Griffith bat EPDG and Oakes EPDG
posts.post_content: Looking for Griffith bat and Oakes EPDG. Graded or raw. I'm not picky.  I also may be interested in other Reds off backs I don't have.
Are you in need of a Bob Spade EPDG? It’s a double I would love to trade.
